column4: #ubuntu is the Ubuntu support channel, #ubuntu+1 supports the development version of Ubuntu and #ubuntu-offtopic is for random chatter. Welcome!
I have a lot of hardware that is dependant on windows software. It does not run on linux. And a lot of the programs I prefere are running .NET (not on linux)
I hope you don't mistunderstand me. I am not trying to say windows is better. I say why I might prefere windows. And search for reasons why linux would be better.
#ubuntu is the Ubuntu support channel, #ubuntu+1 supports the development version of Ubuntu and #ubuntu-offtopic is for random chatter. Welcome!
